hero.title: India's First AI Platform for Cricket Excellence
hero.subtitle: Pioneering AI at a massive scale to enhance performance and produce the best cricketers in India.
hero.backgroundImageAlt: Futuristic AI data streams overlaid on a cricket pitch

journeyFlowchart.title: Your Journey to Success
journeyFlowchart.subtitle: Follow the path from trials to professional cricket sponsorship

items.title: Eligibility Criteria:
items.description: TCL registration process is very simple and straightforward. Are you 12 years or older? If yes, then this marks the beginning of your cricketing journey. For such a significant sports event, a small registration fee is required.

items.title: Selection Process
items.description: Following TCL Registration, players will have the opportunity to showcase their talents in a cricket trial match. Upon selection, players are enrolled in the Turbo Cricket League (TCL) with an additional nominal fees.

items.title: Mentors and Experts
items.description: The talent and dedication of the player will lead them to success. There is a team of selectors with expertise in identifying promising talent, who will be the Future Cricket Stars.

cta.title: Turbo Cricket League
cta.description: Hurry and secure your spot in TCL | Turbo Cricket League - register now and join the cricket excitement!

offlineLeague.title: The Ultimate Offline League
offlineLeague.description: We're recruiting the best talent from across the country for our high-stakes offline cricket league. This is your chance to get scouted, win sponsorships, and compete for incredible prizes. The grand final will be held in a prestigious International stadium!

items.title: AI PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS
items.description: Our system monitors every move during matches, providing data-driven insights to elevate your game.

items.title: PERSONALIZED TRAINING
items.description: Receive training programs tailored to your unique strengths and weaknesses, identified by our AI.

items.title: NATIONWIDE TRAINING CENTERS
items.description: We're building 12 state-of-the-art offline facilities equipped with our AI technology for hands-on training.

items.title: Nationwide Scouting
items.description: Transparent trials across India to find the best talent.

items.title: Elite Mentorship
items.description: Train with top coaches & ex-international players.

items.title: Life-Changing Rewards
items.description: Win massive cash prizes, vehicles, and sponsorships.

items.title: Fair & Transparent
items.description: 100% merit-based selection, powered by AI analytics.

finalCTA.title: Your Journey to Professional Cricket Begins Here.
finalCTA.subtitle: Don't wait for the opportunity. Create it with the power of AI.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description: Young Stars Cricket League isn't just a cricket tournament; it's a launching pad for aspiring cricketers. If you dream of a future in cricket, YSCLeague provides unparalleled opportunities to showcase your talent and rise through the ranks. With cricket trials, state-level leagues, national auctions, international tours, and a chance to get noticed by top team owners and celebrities, YSCL offers the ultimate cricketing experience. Elevate your cricketing career with YSCL, where dreams take flight, and the journey to cricketing glory begins. Join us and be a part of the cricketing revolution!

features.title: Your Path to Cricket Stardom:
features.description: YSCLeague offers a clear pathway for young cricketers to reach their full potential. From state trials to national auctions, we provide the platform for your cricketing journey.

features.title: Mentored by the Best:
features.description: With ICC and BCCI-level umpires and seasoned coaches overseeing trials, you receive top-notch guidance, helping you hone your skills and excel in the game.

features.title: Exposure and Opportunities:
features.description: YSCLeague opens doors to national and international exposure, drawing the attention of team owners, celebrities, and sponsors. This is your chance to turn your passion for cricket into a promising career.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by Thousand of Players and Coaches

testimonials.text: YSCLeague has been a game-changer in my cricket career. The platform it provides for young talents is unparalleled. Thanks to YSCL, I'm now a state-level player, living my dream!
testimonials.name: Rahul Sharma

testimonials.text: As a parent, I'm incredibly impressed with YSCLeague commitment to the safety and development of young cricketers. My child's growth, both as a player and an individual, has been remarkable.
testimonials.name: Priya Singh

testimonials.text: Coaching at YSCLeague has been a truly rewarding experience. The talent here is extraordinary, and YSCL's dedication to cricket excellence shines through quality coaching.
testimonials.name: Amit Patel

testimonials.text: The opportunities provided by YSCLeague are unmatched. I've seen incredible growth in my skills and confidence since joining. This is truly a platform for champions.
testimonials.name: Vikram Kumar

testimonials.text: As a coach, I appreciate the professional approach and dedication of YSCLeague. The platform gives young players the exposure they need to succeed at higher levels.
testimonials.name: Rajesh Mehta

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Turbo Cricket League was born from a simple yet powerful idea: to create a transparent, merit-based platform for India's hidden cricket talent. We saw countless gifted players in gullies and local grounds who lacked the right opportunities. TCL is our answer—a professional ecosystem to discover, nurture, and launch the next generation of cricket superstars.
ourStory.imageAlt: Group of diverse young cricketers standing together

visionMission.title: Our Vision
visionMission.description: To be India's most trusted and exciting pathway for young cricketers to achieve their professional dreams.

visionMission.title: Our Mission
visionMission.description: To unearth talent from every corner of the country through fair selections, provide elite mentorship, and create a world-class competitive tournament.

items.title: Fairness
items.description: A level playing field where only performance matters.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: An open and clear selection process for all.

items.title: Opportunity
items.description: Providing a real chance for every deserving player.

items.title: Growth
items.description: Nurturing talent into professional athletes.

timeline.title: The Idea
timeline.description: Conceptualized a nationwide talent hunt to bridge the gap between gully cricket and professional leagues.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Turbo Cricket League was officially formed, and partnerships with top coaches were established.

timeline.title: Nationwide Launch
timeline.description: Launched the first-ever All-India trials, receiving an overwhelming response from aspiring cricketers.

timeline.title: Inaugural Season
timeline.description: The first Grand Player Auction and Tournament are set to take place, marking a new era in grassroots cricket.

legalAdvisor.title: Legal Advisor
legalAdvisor.name: Adv. Vivek Singh
legalAdvisor.imageAlt: Adv. Vivek Singh - Legal Advisor for Turbo Cricket League
legalAdvisor.description: Adv. Vivek Singh is the official legal counsel for the Turbo Cricket League (TCL), overseeing all legal and regulatory matters related to the league's operations. With expertise in contract drafting, dispute resolution, and compliance, Adv. Vivek Singh plays a key role in ensuring the league functions within a strong and transparent legal framework.
legalAdvisor.responsibilities: His responsibilities include handling player and franchise agreements, sponsorship and media rights contracts, disciplinary matters, intellectual property protection, and litigation support. Known for a meticulous approach and practical legal solutions, Adv. Vivek Singh works closely with league management, teams, and stakeholders to proactively manage legal risks and uphold the integrity of the league.

auctionPage.title: The Grand Player Auction
auctionPage.description: This is where futures are made. 200 shortlisted players, 8 professional franchises, one life-changing night.

infoCards.title: Base Price
infoCards.description: Bidding for every player starts at a base price of ₹15,000.

infoCards.title: Max Bid
infoCards.description: Franchises can bid up to ₹5 Lakhs to secure the best talent for their team.

infoCards.title: Top 200 Players
infoCards.description: Only the top 200 performers from the High-Performance Camp make it to the auction.

items.title: Professional Contracts
items.description: Secure a professional contract with a franchise and get paid to play.

items.title: Sponsorships & Exposure
items.description: Gain visibility with media coverage, brand endorsements, and sponsorship deals.

hero.title: Build the Future of Cricket
hero.subtitle: We're building India's fastest-growing sports-tech platform, revolutionizing grassroots cricket with AI and digital innovation. Join our 6-month internship program with PPO opportunities.

items.title: Direct Mentorship
items.description: Work directly with founders and industry experts, gaining high-level visibility.

items.title: National-Level Projects
items.description: Contribute to impactful projects that are shaping the future of cricket in India.

items.title: Advanced Tech Access
items.description: Utilize national coaches, training resources, and our cutting-edge analytics tools.

items.title: High-Growth Path
items.description: Thrive in a dynamic startup environment with a clear path to a full-time offer.

items.title: Academic Excellence
items.description: Minimum 80% in 10th & 12th grades. Minimum 65% in Bachelor's & Master's degree.

items.title: Key Skills & Passion
items.description: Strong communication, problem-solving, and teamwork skills. Passion for sports, tech, or startups is a plus!

internshipRoles.title: Sales Intern
internshipRoles.description: Drive expansion and scalable projects for league growth. Manage community and college network development. Coordinate launches in new regions.

internshipRoles.title: Web Developer Intern (Full Stack)
internshipRoles.description: Design, develop, and maintain the league website and dashboards. Ensure seamless and responsive user experience on all devices. Build and integrate frontend and backend functions, develop and consume APIs.

internshipRoles.title: Business Development Intern
internshipRoles.description: Research and identify partnership and sponsorship opportunities. Support league expansion in new cities and districts. Build collaborations with local communities and college networks.

internshipRoles.title: HR Intern
internshipRoles.description: Manage recruitment pipelines and interviews. Support onboarding and documentation. Develop HR policies and foster team culture.

internshipRoles.title: CEO Office Intern
internshipRoles.description: Collaborate directly with founders on strategy and high-priority projects. Manage cross-team coordination and support data-driven decision-making.

internshipRoles.title: AI / Research Intern
internshipRoles.description: Work on AI player analytics and prediction models. Research and design advanced AI/ML models including deep learning and computer vision. Develop end-to-end ML and AI pipelines.

contactPage.title: Get In Touch
contactPage.description: Have questions or want to partner with us? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out through the form or contact details below.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.successDescription: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

contactInfo.title: Our Office
contactInfo.value: A-116, Urbtech Trade centre, Sector 132, Noida

newsPage.title: News & Media
newsPage.description: The latest updates, announcements, and stories from the heart of the Turbo Cricket League.

articles.title: TCL Announces Nationwide Trials for 2025-26 Season
articles.excerpt: The search for India's next cricket superstar begins! Turbo Cricket League has officially opened registrations for its nationwide trials...

articles.title: Former International Stars Join TCL as Mentors
articles.excerpt: In a major boost for young talent, several former international cricketers have joined the TCL mentorship panel to guide the next generation.

articles.title: Franchise Auction Sets New Records
articles.excerpt: The Grand Player Auction was a massive success, with franchises spending big to build their dream teams for the upcoming season.

playerJourneyPage.title: The Path to Glory
playerJourneyPage.subtitle: Your step-by-step guide from registration to lifting the trophy. This is where your professional journey begins.

steps.title: Step 1: Registration
steps.description: Your journey starts with a simple online registration. Secure your spot for the trials.

steps.title: Step 2: All India Trials
steps.description: Showcase your skills in front of expert selectors at our nationwide trials.

content.label: All-Rounder:
content.value: Achieve any two: 10 runs / 1 wicket / Defend 8 runs.

content.highlight: Top 400 players qualify for the next stage!

steps.title: Step 3: High-Performance Camp
steps.description: The top 400 players attend a fully-organized, 1-week camp with elite coaching.

items: 2 official matches per player to prove your mettle.
Top 200 performers advance to the auction!

steps.title: Step 4: The Player Auction
steps.description: The top 200 players enter the Grand Player Auction, where 8 franchises will bid for you.

steps.title: Step 5: The Grand Tournament
steps.description: Live your dream. Compete in a national-level tournament with full media coverage.

accordion.content: 8 Franchises compete in league + knockout stages. The final match will be held in a prestigious International Stadium. We provide your kit, accommodation, and medical support. Your only job is to PLAY & PERFORM.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Your journey from gully to glory is just one click away.

offlineLeague.title: Turbo T-10 League 2026
offlineLeague.description: Join India's premier T10 cricket tournament! Fast-paced action, knockout format, and incredible prizes await. Register your team or join as an individual player.

playerJourneyPage.title: The Path to T10 Glory
playerJourneyPage.subtitle: Your step-by-step guide to competing in the Turbo T-10 League 2026. Fast-paced cricket, knockout format, and life-changing opportunities.

steps.title: Step 1: Registration
steps.description: Register as a team or individual player for the Turbo T-10 League 2026.

steps.title: Step 2: Tournament Participation
steps.description: Compete in fast-paced T10 matches in a knockout format. Every match counts!

accordion.content: Knockout Tournament - Single elimination format where teams compete head-to-head. Win to advance, lose and you're out. The intensity is unmatched, and every ball matters in this fast-paced format.

steps.title: Step 3: Win Big
steps.description: Compete for the championship and win incredible cash prizes!

cta.title: Ready to Join T10 League?
cta.description: Register now and be part of India's fastest cricket tournament!

offlineLeague.title: The Ultimate Offline League
offlineLeague.description: We're recruiting the best talent from across the country for our high-stakes offline cricket league. This is your chance to get scouted, win sponsorships, and compete for incredible prizes. The grand final will be held in a prestigious International stadium!
